summary:
- **Entitlement Offer Results**: Non-renounceable pro-rata entitlement offer of 77 new options (Loyalty Options) per 100 shares at 1.5 cents each, raising ~$1M (AUD) pre-costs.  
- **Loyalty Options Details**: Exercise price 14 cents, expiry 30 June 2027. Bonus: 1 free piggy-back option (21 cents, same expiry) for every 2 Loyalty Options exercised by 31 Dec 2025.  
- **Take-up**: 29% participation (19.2M options, ~$288k raised). Remaining 46.1M options (~$692k) taken by underwriter (Blue Ocean Equities) and sub-underwriters.  
- **Key Dates**: Loyalty Options issuance on **17 July 2025**; shortfall issuance expected **23 July 2025**.  

*(Omitted: background on Photosoft™ tech, forward-looking statements, US restrictions)*
